relations.target: AAVE: a nonstandard form of American English characteristically spoken by African Americans in the United States <i73106>
hate: dislike intensely; feel antipathy or aversion towards; 'I hate Mexican food'; 'She detests politicians' <i30608>
express: articulate; either verbally or with a cry, shout, or noise; 'She expressed her anger'; 'He uttered a curse' <i26308>

senses.definition: to have and express negative sentiments about a person
